title: Women's Winternship
content:
This January, we will host our third European Women's Winternship. This is an exciting programme that offers women an opportunity to learn about our firm, the basics of trading and a view of what Virtu does in the global financial marketplace. You’ll also get insight into a career in financial services through engaging panels and networking events with top female talent at Virtu, as well as insight into the different roles that exist within our firm.

One week programme, from 8th to 12th January 2024, which will be hosted in our Dublin office
Each day will be a combination of lectures, and fun programming challenges and activities
Engaging social events to get to know our team and culture
A final group contest

REQUIREMENTS:

Exceptional female talent at second and third year level (first years may also be considered)
Excellent academic background (all subjects welcome)
Outstanding quantitative problem‐solving skills and mathematical aptitude
Some programming experience is preferred but NOT required.   
Highly motivated and tenacious individual, with a proven ability to take initiative and work independently and within a team
Team player: authentic, genuine person who can work collective goals
Interest in a career in financial services

 
THE PROCESS: 
After applicants pass an initial resume screening, an online programming and/or aptitude test may be sent via email. After which, we will contact you to arrange interviews.
We look forward to meeting you! 
 
Final Applications: Friday 1 December 2023
 
Virtu Financial is an equal opportunity employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace, welcoming you for who you are and does not discriminate based on race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.
